description: A React component named FavoritesPanel that displays a list of favorite recipes, allowing users to view, remove, or clear favorites. It uses context to manage favorites state and provides a sidebar drawer UI.

methods.name: FavoritesPanel({ open, onClose, onOpenRecipe })
methods.description: React functional component rendering the favorites sidebar panel with actions to view, remove, or clear favorites.

ctags.name: FavoritesPanel
ctags.pattern: /^export default function FavoritesPanel({ open, onClose, onOpenRecipe }) {$/
